name: Wayfarer (studiokaboom)
description:
Wayfarer is a Sci-Fi top-down TOWER DEFENSE game that implements RPG elements. The Wayfarer/Player is called upon to defend colonists throughout the galaxy using the Endeavor, a defence force ship on a mission to defend colonists from space pirates and other aggressive adversaries.

Features:

  1. Build defences
  2. Multiple enemy types
  3. Multiple waves of enemies
  4. Unique In-game UI
  5. Cool graphical FXs in a low poly setting
